    • visualizeHashMap

      public void visualizeHashMap(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
      Visualizes the story as panes and lines. The panes and lines are clickable and can be used to edit them. Uses panes over canvas as it is easier to add click events to the objects.
      Parameters:
      pane - The pane to add the story to.
